boardgame.name: Die Minen von Zavandor
The Mines of Zavandor
ザヴァンドールの鉱山
boardgame.description: In this third game in Lookout's Zavandor fantasy setting, it's all about dwarves. And mining. And gemstones. And other enhancements for the mines that need to get developed further during the game to have full effect._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;4 different gems are the currencies in this game. However, when collecting income you draw cards from 4 different mines (card stacks) with each having its own distribution! The number of gems you earn depends on the upgrade level of your dwarves. Gems are used to either win new objects for their mine through simultaneous 4-way auctions, or to enhance their mines, objects, and victory point count. Another innovative part is that each object has to be upgraded to fully use its benefits, e.g. a level 1 dwarf only gives you 1 income per round, some level 3 dwarves give you 3 income._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On the King's way through the mountain, the requirements for upgrading some special cards always change, and only the player who wins the sapphire auction knows where the next turn will lead to. There are shorter and longer paths to the Coronation Chamber, where the game ends. The game lasts between 10 to 12 rounds._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Gaming Rules! Podblast – Episode 7 – Alexander Pfister, Blackout, Great Western Trail, and others
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Die Minen von Zavandor: Die verlorenen Spruchrollen

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Mines of Zavandor - New, In shrinkwrap. Payment: PayPal, Money Order, Old fashioned Cash Shipping: You pay actual cost! *No goofy math!* Most games cost $8 (or less) to $12 to ship in the US. We will always use the cheapest/fastest method to get you your games. Generally, this will be FedEx Home Delivery or USPS Priority Mail. In the case of large games, the cheapest method may be USPS Parcel Post. If this is the case, we will give you the option of a faster method of shipping. YES! You can combine items! Order multiple games and we will combine shipping costs. You STILL only have to pay for the actual shipping cost! (W00t!)

Played only once, this game of dwarven mining and gemstone bidding is ready for you to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;dig_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; in! i take great care of my games and i_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m asking $22. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m sorry to see it go, but i need to make some space in my mead hall and some extra gold in my wallet.

Z-Man Games (ZMG 7059) Grimmborn, King of the Dwarves of Zavandor, is about to retire. He needs to arrange for his successor. The traditional method of choosing a successor is having a procession of two to four candidates through the mines. You are one of those candidates, following the Path to Kingship, which winds through the depths of the mountains to reach the Coronation Chamber. On the way, you will be receiving gems with which to bid on to acquire improvements and the upgrading of those improvements. The player with the most victory points upon reaching the chamber is the winner and new King of the Dwarves.
Reserved for Randall Fischer.

I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll be working at Feuerland Booth (4-C116) this year. For handover I can offer to meet you - during setup on Wednesday OR - at the general Math Trade Meeting on Friday at 12.00. For contacting me at the fair, my mobile is +49 176 56806418. I’d appreciate if you could leave me your mobile no as well. I’m looking forward to meeting you. Cheers, Carsten

*Shipping via USPS 2 day priority medium flat rate at $13.65, unless price is cheaper due to proximity of delivery or you request a different service. In this third game in Lookout_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Zavandor fantasy setting, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s all about dwarves. And mining. And gemstones. And other enhancements for the mines that need to get developed further during the game to have full effect. 4 different gems are the currencies in this game. However, when collecting income you draw cards from 4 different mines (card stacks) with each having its own distribution! The number of gems you earn depends on the upgrade level of your dwarves. Gems are used to either win new objects for their mine through simultaneous 4-way auctions, or to enhance their mines, objects, and victory point count. Another innovative part is that each object has to be upgraded to fully use its benefits, e.g. a level 1 dwarf only gives you 1 income per round, some level 3 dwarves give you 3 income. On the King_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s way through the mountain, the requirements for upgrading some special cards always change, and only the player who wins the sapphire auction knows where the next turn will lead to. There are shorter and longer paths to the Coronation Chamber, where the game ends. The game lasts between 10 to 12 rounds.
Factory sealed in original shrink wrap. Shipping is $14.00 for Priority Mail. PayPal payments can be sent to bitva2@yahoo.com, thanks!
